bioghist.p: Barbara C. Johnson graduated from Oberlin College in 1960, and was Associate Professor of Anthropology and Coordinator of Jewish Studies at Ithaca College. A Shansi fellow in Madurai from 1960-1962, she worked for many years with Jewish women in Kerala, in southwestern India. Johnson has published a book, Oh, Lovely Parrot! Jewish Women's Songs From Kerala (2004), a CD of the same title, and many articles on the Kerala Jews.

scopecontent.p: This selection of Malayalam Jewish songs from Kerala, South India, collected by Barbara C. Johnson from 1977-1976, includes six manuscripts (1 original and 5 photocopies) from the Paradesi Community, Cochin, and one manuscript (photocopy) from the Community of Chennamangalam.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
